SetEnabled.Command: $b='HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Notifications\Settings'; Set-ItemProperty -Path $b -Name Enabled -Type DWord -Value 0 -Force; Get-ChildItem -Path $b | ForEach-Object { Set-ItemProperty -Path $_.PSPath -Name Enabled -Type DWord -Value 0 -Force }

DelEnabled.Command: $b='HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Notifications\Settings'; Remove-ItemProperty -Path $b -Name Enabled; Get-ChildItem -Path $b | ForEach-Object { Remove-ItemProperty -Path $_.PSPath -Name Enabled }

RemoveWindowsOld.Command: $dest="$home\Desktop";$bat="$home\Desktop\Taskband.bat";$ms="$env:APPDATA\Microsoft\Windows\Recent\AutomaticDestinations\f01b4d95cf55d32a.automaticDestinations-ms";if(Test-Path $ms){Copy-Item $ms -Destination $dest -Force};$tb="$env:APPDATA\Microsoft\Internet Explorer\Quick Launch\User Pinned\TaskBar";$tbdes=Join-Path $dest "TaskBar";Remove-Item $tbdes -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue;if(Test-Path $tb){Copy-Item $tb -Destination $tbdes -Recurse -Force};$hex=((Get-ItemProperty "HKCU:\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Taskband" -Name "Favorites").Favorites|ForEach-Object {'{0:X2}' -f $_}) -join '';$hexnis=((Get-ItemProperty "HKCU:\Control Panel\NotifyIconSettings" -Name "UIOrderList").UIOrderList|ForEach-Object {'{0:X2}' -f $_}) -join '';$q=[char]34;$lines=@("@echo off","",("reg add "+$q+"HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Taskband"+$q+" /v Favorites /t REG_BINARY /d "+$hex+" /f"),("reg add "+$q+"HKCU\Control Panel\NotifyIconSettings"+$q+" /v UIOrderList /t REG_BINARY /d "+$hexnis+" /f"));Set-Content -Path $bat -Value $lines

DisableCbdhsvcServices.Command: $base='HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services'; Get-ChildItem $base | Where-Object { $_.PSChildName -like 'cbdhsvc*' } | ForEach-Object { New-ItemProperty -Path $_.PSPath -Name Start -PropertyType DWord -Value 4 -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }

EnableCbdhsvcServices.Command: $base='HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services'; Get-ChildItem $base | Where-Object { $_.PSChildName -like 'cbdhsvc*' } | ForEach-Object { New-ItemProperty -Path $_.PSPath -Name Start -PropertyType DWord -Value 2 -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
